trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> class represents a set of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> représente un ensemble d'objets <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> implements the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> implémente l'interface <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crée une instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Le constructeur <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor" /> crée une instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> class that represents the specified CMS/PKCS #7 recipient.
trans-unit.target: Instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> qui représente le destinataire CMS/PKCS #7 spécifié.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> class and adds the specified recipient.
trans-unit.target: Le constructeur <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> crée une instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> et ajoute le destinataire spécifié.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> enumeration that specifies the type of subject identifier.
trans-unit.target: Membre de l'énumération <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> qui spécifie le type d'identificateur d'objet.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> collection that contains the certificates that identify the recipients.
trans-unit.target: Collection <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> qui contient les certificats qui identifient les destinataires.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> class and adds recipients based on the specified subject identifier and set of certificates that identify the recipients.
trans-unit.target: Le constructeur <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection)" /> crée une instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> et ajoute des destinataires basés sur l'identificateur d'objet spécifié et sur le jeu de certificats qui identifient les destinataires.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> object that represents the recipient to add to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Objet <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> qui représente le destinataire à ajouter à la collection <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Add(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> method adds a recipient to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: La méthode <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Add(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> ajoute un destinataire à la collection <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: If the method succeeds, the method returns an <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the zero-based position where the recipient is to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Si la méthode réussit, elle retourne une valeur <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> qui représente la position de base zéro où le destinataire sera inséré.

trans-unit.source: If the method fails, it throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Si la méthode échoue, une exception est levée.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="recipient" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="recipient" /> est <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection to an array.
trans-unit.target: Copie la collection <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> dans un tableau.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Array" /> object to which the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection is to be copied.
trans-unit.target: Objet <see cref="T:System.Array" /> dans lequel la collection <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> doit être copiée.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> where the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection is copied.
trans-unit.target: Index de base de zéro de <c>array</c> où la collection <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> est copiée.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" /> method copies the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection to an array.
trans-unit.target: La méthode <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" /> copie la collection <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> dans un tableau.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is not large enough to hold the specified elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> n'est pas assez grand pour contenir les éléments spécifiés.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> does not contain the proper number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> ne contient pas le nombre voulu de dimensions.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> est <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is outside the range of elements in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> est en dehors de la plage des éléments de <paramref name="array" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> objects where the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection is to be copied.
trans-unit.target: Tableau des objets <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> où la collection <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> doit être copiée.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index for the array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> objects in <c>array</c> to which the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection is copied.
trans-unit.target: Index de base zéro pour le tableau d’objets <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> dans <c>array</c> où la collection <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> est copiée.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.CopyTo(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient[],System.Int32)" /> method copies the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection to a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> array.
trans-unit.target: La méthode <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.CopyTo(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient[],System.Int32)" /> copie la collection <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> dans un tableau <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is not large enough to hold the specified elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> n'est pas assez grand pour contenir les éléments spécifiés.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> does not contain the proper number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> ne contient pas le nombre voulu de dimensions.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> est <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is outside the range of elements in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> est en dehors de la plage des éléments de <paramref name="array" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Count" /> property retrieves the number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: La propriété <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Count" /> récupère le nombre d'éléments de la collection <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valeur <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> qui représente le nombre d'éléments de la collection.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.GetEnumerator" /> method returns a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> object for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: La méthode <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.GetEnumerator" /> retourne un objet <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> pour la collection <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> object that can be used to enumerate the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Objet <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> pouvant être utilisé pour énumérer la collection <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.IsSynchronized" /> property retrieves whether access to the collection is synchronized, or thread safe.
trans-unit.target: La propriété <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.IsSynchronized" /> récupère une valeur indiquant si l'accès à la collection est synchronisé, ou thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns <see langword="false" />, which means that the collection is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Cette propriété retourne toujours <see langword="false" />, ce qui signifie que la collection n'est pas thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value of <see langword="false" />, which means that the collection is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Valeur <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> pour <see langword="false" />, ce qui signifie que la collection n'est pas thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valeur <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> qui représente l'index de la collection.

trans-unit.source: The index is zero based.
trans-unit.target: L'index est de base zéro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Item(System.Int32)" /> property retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: La propriété <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Item(System.Int32)" /> récupère l'objet <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> à l'index spécifié de la collection.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Objet <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> à l'index spécifié.

trans-unit.source: The value of an argument was outside the allowable range of values as defined by the called method.
trans-unit.target: La valeur d'un argument se trouvait en dehors de la plage de valeurs autorisées telle que la définit la méthode appelée.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> object that represents the recipient to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Objet <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> qui représente le destinataire à supprimer de la collection.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Remove(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> method removes a recipient from the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: La méthode <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Remove(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> supprime un destinataire de la collection <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="recipient" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="recipient" /> est <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.SyncRoot" /> property retrieves an <see cref="T:System.Object" /> object used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: La propriété <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.SyncRoot" /> récupère un objet <see cref="T:System.Object" /> utilisé pour synchroniser l'accès à la collection <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> object that is used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Objet <see cref="T:System.Object" /> qui est utilisé pour synchroniser l'accès à la collection <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.System#Collections#IEnumerable#GetEnumerator" /> method returns a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> object for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: La méthode <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.System#Collections#IEnumerable#GetEnumerator" /> retourne un objet <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> pour la collection <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> object that can be used to enumerate the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Objet <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> pouvant être utilisé pour énumérer la collection <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" />.
